span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n．诡计多端，欺骗 ：deception by artful subterfuge or sophistry
【例】He wasn't above using chicanery to win votes.
他不屑于用诡计来获得投票。
【近】deception, artifice, legerdemain, wile, subterfuge
【反】aboveboard action 光明正大的行为；honest dealing 诚实的行为；forthrightness 坦白
